data.title: Exor International Featured in "Top 100 – A Guide to Made in Italy Automation"
data.meta_description: Discover Exor International's inclusion in the prestigious 'Top 100 – A Guide to Made in Italy Automation by EDITORIALE DELFINO, highlighting our leadership in cutting-edge automation technologies and commitment to industry innovation
data.text:
Exor International is proud to announce its inclusion in the prestigious "Top 100 – A Guide to Made in Italy Automation" by EDITORIALE DELFINO. This definitive guide showcases over 150 leading Italian companies at the forefront of automation technologies, providing invaluable insights into the industry’s latest trends and innovations.

For Exor International, this recognition not only highlights our commitment to excellence but also underscores our position as a key player in the automation sector. Being featured in this esteemed guide enables us to forge connections with industry peers, exchange technical knowledge, and contribute to the continuous advancement of Italian industrial technology.

Readers of the guide can benefit from specialized information, identify trusted suppliers, and stay informed about cutting-edge industrial solutions, ensuring they remain at the forefront of technological advancements.

"We are honored to have been recognized in the 'Top 100 - Guida all'Automazione Made in Italy'," stated Claudio Ambra, CTO of Exor International. "This recognition reflects our commitment to innovation and quality in automation technologies."

Ambra added, "We are proud to have participated in the Roundtable organized by Editoriale Delfino during SPS Italia. This event, which brought together some of the most interesting companies in the automation sector in Italy, served as a great opportunity to explore technological challenges and future goals, reinforcing the image of Italian companies as active contributors to the economic and strategic development of our sector."
